item.title: Rules
item.description: 1: DO NOT SET OFF A F@^$ING NUKE, the server will die! 2: Please don’t lag the server to death. We try to avoid pay to win, and if anything matches P2W material, please dm/email me at drrate#4256, and I’ll sort it out. 3: Treat people how you want to be treated. This is not kindergarten, and blowing someone up with their diamonds is not ok. 4: DO NOT GRIEF. Even as the name suggests, we are NOT committing in-game crimes to other people.
